1.0.name: wordpress/donate-ribbon
1.0.description: Places a black ribbon in the upper right corner of your blog displaying the word "Donate" in white text. You can set the link to any URL you choose via the settings page. Now with vertical offset options. You may also set the link title hover message. By default it is set to the Redcross donation page.
